title: Euphoria
description: This is an alternate Cover Edition for ASIN: B00D5E5JUE.NEW YORK TIMES and USA TODAY BESTSELLING AUTHOR, ELLE CASEY, brings readers Book 2 in the 2-book Young Adult/New Adult Paranormal Romance DUALITY series. This is Book 2 in the Duality Series. Readers should start with Melancholia (Duality Series, Book 1). Rae and Malcolm are on the run with help from friends. Not sure who to trust anymore or where they're even going, they must work together to get free of the group who seeks to bind them and take advantage of their influence over others.Content Warning: Sexual situations, foul language, and general smartassery.
author: Elle Casey
